effect.scarlet_violet: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
effect.the_teal_mask: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
